references.paper_title: Exploiting spatial-temporal relationships for 3d pose estimation via graph convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the work done in this paper as it provides a baseline for pose estimation via graph convolutional networks.

references.paper_title: Anatomy-aware 3d human pose estimation with bone-based pose decomposition
references.reason: This paper proposes an anatomy-aware approach to 3D pose estimation which is important to the work done in this paper.

references.paper_title: Diffpose: Multi-hypothesis human pose estimation using diffusion models
references.reason: This paper provides a multi-hypothesis approach to human pose estimation, which is similar to the approach taken in this paper.

references.paper_title: MHFormer: Multi-hypothesis transformer for 3d human pose estimation
references.reason: This paper is another important work in multi-hypothesis human pose estimation that is directly compared to the work done in this paper.

references.paper_title: Mixste: Seq2seq mixed spatio-temporal encoder for 3d human pose estimation in video
references.reason: This paper provides the backbone for the work done in this paper which makes it highly relevant.
